price: They said, “By Allah, Allah has favored you[37] over us, and we have surely been sinful.”
arabic: قَالُواْ تَٱللَّهِ لَقَدۡ ءَاثَرَكَ ٱللَّهُ عَلَيۡنَا وَإِن كُنَّا لَخَٰطِـِٔينَ
footnotes: [37] Finally, they admitted that he was the ‘favored one’.
